desc: Winkelshoek, established in 1904, is built on decades of rich history, famous for its fertile soil, picturesque views and award-winning wines. Our vineyards tell a story of hard work, determination and a passion for winemaking. We trust our soil in producing the best quality grapes for our wines.

layout.text: A farm built on decades of rich history, famous for its fertile soil, picturesque views and award-winning wines.
